attributes.action: Keep Britain Tidy Campaign - with Goverment TV adverts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last campaign was many years ago. The time has come for a new campaign aimed at all those who were unaware of the last one. Britain is cluttered with litter everywhere. It looks horrible and the nation needs to address & action it.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
